alert.note: Alert for Jim Hogg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jim Hogg County through 515 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over San Rafael Ranch Airport, or 7 miles southeast of Agua Nueva, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Rafael Ranch Airport and Puesta Del Sol Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for Deep South Texas.
